short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace modern Microsoft Copilot with the original AI assistant - Clippy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace modern Microsoft Copilot with the OG AI assistant - Clippy! This fan-made extension simply replaces the icon and text on copilot.microsoft.com so it looks like Clippy is the one responding.

Clippy/Clippit and Copilot are created by the Microsoft Corporation.
